tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>*****ATTENTION SURVIVORS*****</>

Welcome to the Twisted Whiskers Cluster — a realm where adventure, strategy, and survival intertwine. Here, every corner of the world holds secrets, danger, and opportunity. From your first step on the sunlit plains to your descent into the shadowy depths of the unknown, the cluster is designed to challenge your cunning, your resilience, and your sense of community.

<TextStyle.Orange>Within this hub, you will find guidance on server operations, mods, rates, and community rules. Take time to explore each tab to understand the unique systems we’ve created to support both new and veteran survivors. Engage with our Discord, participate in events, and make your mark on the Twisted Whiskers legacy.</>

<TextStyle.White>Newest Server Features</>
- Twisted Kittens Companion In-Game Shop is back in the Radial.
- Some new features & info in-game with the AAT Button on the bottom right of the inventory screen!
- More features coming in the near future for the token system and the community mod!

<TextStyle.Green>Discover your potential, survive the wilds, and write your story in the annals of Twisted Whiskers.</>
tab1.text2: Explore each tab to stay up to date with rules, rates, mods, and community events. Your adventure begins here.

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Twisted Kittens Cluster – The Laws of Survival</>
Welcome to the Ark, survivor. These are the rules that keep chaos in check. Obey them, or risk the wrath of the wild... and the whiskers.
Suggestions are always welcome — your voice matters in the pride.

<TextStyle.Orange>Territory & Tribal Claims</>
- Each Tribe may claim two bases within each map. Each must not cause lag or fence in huge swaths of land.
- Lone wolves (solo players) may also have one of each.
- If a solo player joins a tribe, their base must be dismantled and merged into the tribe’s official stronghold.
- Claiming more than allowed base locations will result in admin action.

<TextStyle.Orange>Building With Balance</>
- Build your dream sanctuary — clean, fair, and performance-friendly.
- Planning a mega base? Request admin approval before expanding beyond the norm.
- Do not block high-resource zones, explorer notes, or artifact caves.
- If unsure, ask before building.
- No structure spam. Taming traps must be cleaned up after use.

<TextStyle.Orange>Code of the Wild</>
- No offline breeding.
- No egg theft.
- Harassment is never tolerated.
- Trust is earned — admins are not referees for tribe drama.

<TextStyle.Orange>The Harsh Truth</>
- Lost tames or loot? That’s Ark.
- Admins will not replace losses.
- Admin support is handled in order received.
- Abandoned creatures left at others’ bases or obelisks will be wiped without warning.
tab2.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Disciplinary Path (The Rule of Three)</>
- First Offense: Verbal warning + 24hr notice to fix issue (posted in Discord)
- Second Offense: Structures, tames, or players may be wiped
- Failure to correct after 24hr = automatic second offense
- Third Offense (within 30 days): Permanent banishment

Honor the pride: report rule-breakers. Those who support the server, uphold rules, and help the pride flourish will be rewarded generously.
tab2.text3:
<TextStyle.Red>Flag System Rules & Colors</>
Normal Players: Update flag monthly; failure = tribe wipe
Subscribed Players: Update every 3 months; non-compliance follows normal schedule if subscription ends
Admins: Must also follow 3-month rule; failures result in wipes

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Flag Colors:</>
- Admin Flag (180 days) Jan-Jun: Azure / Twilight, Jul-Dec: Blue / Green
- Donor Flag (90 days) Jan-Mar: Purple / Cyan, Apr-Jun: Magenta / Blue, Jul-Sep: Yellow / Baby Blue, Oct-Dec: Red / Navy Blue
- Free To Play Flag (30 days) Jan: Blue, Feb: Pink, Mar: Forest Green, Apr: Brick, May: Royal, Jun: Magenta, Jul: Red, Aug: Olive, Sep: Yellow, Oct: Black, Nov: Orange, Dec: Green

tab3.text1:

XP 1.5x | Alpha Kill XP 1.33x | Boss XP 2.5x | Wild Kill XP 1.25x | Crafting XP 1.25x
Taming Speed 5x
Harvest 2.5x
Player Water/Food Drain 0.75x
Health Recovery 2.5x
Decay Timer 3.5x
Player Damage 1.25x | Player Resistance 1.25x | Structure Resistance 0x
24 hours in-game = 120 min IRL

tab3.text3:

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Fun & Rewards</>
Words of the Month: Guess correctly for free tokens. Starter lotto: chance to win 1000 tokens, higher tiers coming soon.
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Performance Tips</>
Follow the guide to improve console and lower-end PC performance:
https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/92130-commands-to-help-console-and-lower-speedperformance-pcs
tab4.text3:
<TextStyle.Red>Active Quest & Hidden Treasures</>
Search Bob beaches for hidden prizes, including tames, building materials, and WebToken consumables. 5 locations per map, maintained monthly.

tab5.text1:
This directory lists all player shops registered with Twisted Kittens Gaming. Verified shops adhere to strict rules to protect consumers and maintain fairness.

Rules include: mandatory saddles with tames, prohibition on selling spayed/neutered creatures, and full-stack sales for resources.
tab5.text2: Report violations through GSA radial menu, Discord, or the website. Include date, transaction/violation type, shop name/location, and survivor names involved. Admins will investigate promptly.
tab5.text3:
Visit the Admin Shop for unique items, consumables, and starter kits:
https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/shop
